game.name: Bartender Hustle
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Mix amazing cocktails while you climb the ranks as a bartender and unlock diverse bartending venues in this narrative-driven bartender simulator.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mix amazing cocktails while you climb the ranks as a bartender and unlock diverse bartending venues in this narrative-driven bartender simulator.

reviewHighlights.text: Very interesting game, especially for me who is interested in Barman atmopshere, very chilly and exciting experience. Sadly interface and over-all des...
